title: My google pixel 4a, under "SERVICES ON THIS DEVICE', there is Firebase App indexing, what is this?
content: On my Google Pixel 4a, there are whole lot of Firebase app Indexing, if you see in the screenshots proivded below.  IT gives me an option to send update index and what does that mean and does this mean my apps are being used or created like duplicates or something. please help thank you.
